Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Island
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Island extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents an island of the game.

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Get the size of this island (e.g. 3 means that this island was created merging 3 different islands)
      Returns:
      the size of the island

    • getTowersCount

      public int getTowersCount()
      Returns:
      the number of towers on this island

    • getTowerColor

      public Tower getTowerColor()
      Returns:
      the towers color of this island if conquered, null otherwise

    • getStudents

      public StudentsContainer getStudents()
      Returns:
      a copy of the students located on this island

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Student student)
      Add a student to this island
      Parameters:
      student - the student to add

    • addStudents

      public void addStudents(StudentsContainer studentsContainer)
      Add many students to this island
      Parameters:
      studentsContainer - the students to add

    • merge

      public void merge(Island anotherIsland)
      Merge this island with anotherIsland. All students on anotherIsland will be merged with this island, the same for the towers. They need to be compatible (@see isMergeCompatible)
      Parameters:
      anotherIsland - the island to merge with

    • setConquered

      public void setConquered(Tower towerColor)
      Used when a player has the most influence on this island
      Parameters:
      towerColor - color of the tower of the player

    • isConquered

      public boolean isConquered()
      Returns:
      whether the island is conquered

    • isNoEntry

      public boolean isNoEntry()
      Returns:
      true if on this island is present a no entry tile

    • setNoEntry

      public void setNoEntry(boolean noEntry)
      Set whether on this island is present a No Entry tile
      Parameters:
      noEntry -

    • isMergeCompatible

      public boolean isMergeCompatible(Island anotherIsland)
      Check if two islands are merge-compatible
      Parameters:
      anotherIsland - the other island
      Returns:
      true if this island and anotherIsland can be merged, false otherwise
